instructions.description: The first Mokoko Seed can be found in very middle of the map.
This seed can be seen in the grass to the right of the wooden bridge.
This Mokoko Seed is in Changchun Inn near some tables.
The last Mokoko Seed can be found at the very end of the path near the wooden deck.
The first Mokoko Seed can be found in some water in the corner of the path.
This seed is in the room after breaking the first door to the right of the path.
This Mokoko Seed can be found directly across from the previous seed, on the left side of the staircase.
There are two seeds in this room to the right of the path. You will need to break the stone vases to get to them.
See #4.
You can find this Mokoko Seed hidden in a bush to the left of a stone structure.
This seed is located to the right of a well towards the end of the path.
This seed can be found at the end of this path on the left. It will be in front of a stone coffin.
This seed is at the very end of this path, down the stairs and in the building. You can just walk in.
The last Mokoko Seed is located down the narrow path filled with water. You will see the seed at the end near a dead tree.
The first Mokoko Seed is on the ground, near the burning blazer.
The first Mokoko Seed can be found in front of the pond with a tree in the middle.
This seed is located in front of a wooden fence at the end of the path.
This seed can be found to the left of the staircase between it and rock wall with water on the other side.
The last Mokoko Seed can be found in front of a well.
The first Mokoko Seed is on the ground, near the burning blazer.
